content: this is a very easy yet beautiful balaclava the name meri means sea in estonian because it s warm enough to wear in winter against the sea breeze the hood is pretty wide but there is a tie so it s adjustable it s knit top down and uses a 4 0mm needle for the hood a 3 75mm for the ribbing and a 3 5mm for the edge it s knit in worsted or a thicker dk weight yarn plus a strand of mohair held together it is my first published pattern and has not been tested so if you notice any errors please let me know and i will correct them if you run into a problem while knitting you can message me and i will help you out
